title: Every Breathtaking Red Carpet Look From the 2019 Emmy Awards
text:
Ready or not, we've got another slew of dazzling red carpet looks to show off to you thanks to the 2019 Emmy Awards attendees. Last year's awards brought some of the most jaw-dropping red carpet moments, and according to the photos below, this year is clearly not far behind. While we are anxious to see which of the nominees will walk away winners, we all know that the most talked-about part of the evening by far is the red carpet, and that's exactly what we're here to do.

The crimson roll-out brings out the very best when it comes to celebrity style—though tonight's carpet is actually purple—and even with the first couple of looks, we can tell this year will be one for the books. From the actors and presenters to the performers and nominees, be sure to keep checking back in here as we report on the best of the best from the 71st Annual Emmy Awards red carpet.
